peril.views

Interface ModelView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlickModelView

    public interface ModelView
    Provides a mapping from model objects to their visual counter parts. All the objects returned by the 'getVisual' methods should return the View specific objects. This must be initialised using init(GameController).
    Since:
    2018-02-16
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

      Initialises the ModelView visual elements that should be loaded when the game is initialised.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(GameController game)
        Initialises the ModelView visual elements that should be loaded when the game is initialised.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameController that allows the ModelView to interact with the model of the game.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all the visual elements mappings except those between ModelLinkStates and ModelBoard.

      • addUnit

        void addUnit(java.lang.Object unit)
        Adds a visual counterpart to a ModelUnit. The model counter part should be aggregated by the visual and accessible.
        Parameters:
        unit - The visual counterpart to a ModelUnit.

      • addCountry

        void addCountry(java.lang.Object country)
        Adds a visual counterpart to a ModelCountry. The model counter part should be aggregated by the visual and accessible.
        Parameters:
        country - The visual counterpart to a ModelCountry.
